text: The 2019 Prairie View A&M; Panthers football team represents Prairie View A&M; University in the 2019 NCAA Division I FCS football season. The Panthers are led by second-year head coach Eric Dooley and play their home games at Panther Stadium at Blackshear Field in Prairie View, Texas as members of the West Division of the Southwestern Athletic Conference (SWAC). ==Previous season== The Panthers finished the 2018 season 5–6, 4–3 in SWAC play to finish in a tie for second place in the West Division. ==Preseason== ===Preseason polls=== The SWAC released their preseason poll on July 16, 2019. The Panthers were picked to finish in second place in the West Division. {| class="wikitable" style="display: inline-table;" |+West Division |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1 || Southern || 90 |- align="center" | 2 || Prairie View A&M; || 78 |- align="center" | 3 || Grambling State || 74 |- align="center" | 4 || Texas Southern || 34 |- align="center" | 5 || Arkansas–Pine Bluff || 24 |} {| class="wikitable" style="display: inline-table;" |+East Division |- align="center" | 1 || Alcorn State || 92 |- align="center" | 2 || Alabama A&M; || 70 |- align="center" | 3 || Jackson State || 61 |- align="center" | 4 || Alabama State || 47 |- align="center" | 5 || Mississippi Valley State || 30 |} ===Preseason all–SWAC teams=== The Tigers placed eight players on the preseason all–SWAC teams.
